The item satisfies my needs.   + it's from a nice material + fits very well  + is surprisingly warm + looks good + the item was delivered on time + ressembles a jacket and can both be used as a casual piece or a little more elegant  - a minor fault but the material could be a little more "thicker"  - the fact it's open front (no zipper etc.) makes it an item mostly for "looks"  Those two little faults are just personal dislikes and one of them already mentioned in the item specifics (open ended). Overall the item is high quality, comfy and good looking soo I wholeheartedly recommend it.
